sentences: i purchased this case because it looked very functional ... to my surprise the rivets popped out and the zipper broke about two weeks into it 's use .
i have never been disappointed by a sampsonite product until now .
i have written to them and received no communication in return !
i bought this case for dell inspiron e1505 ( 15 .
4 `` ) screen .
it was way too small .
this case has an inner pocket , which is the actual spot for the laptop to slip in .
i will say it can only fit a 14 `` screen .
i ended up putting my laptop outside the inner pocket , which barely fit .
i wish the manufacturer noticed this problem and not listed for any 15 `` + screens .
the case itself looks pretty high quality , but it 's too thin .
getting the laptop in and out of the case is a huge hassle requiring both hands and lots of pulling .
i have a 15 .
4 `` widescreen dell dimensions 1501 .
it fits in there snug , but as i stated above , getting the computer in and out is pain ( my wife is trying to convince me to return it , but i 'm too lazy , i think we 'll just keep it ) .
also , if you have a wireless mouse , it bulges out .
again , it has to do with the case being so thin .

to some this characteristic may be very desirable because the case is very low profile , but if you have perfiferals like a wireless mouse or a a/c adapter that is more than an inch thick , it bulges out .
there 's padding , of course , so your periferals probably will not be damaged ... it just looks kinda funny .
functionality wise : awesome !
has room for a lot of stuff , and keeps the computer really protected , and that 's the most important feature a case like that can have .
does n't look shiny and fancy , though , and it 's something i look for in everything i buy .
but it varies from a person to another , obviously .
anyway i recommend .
very happy with the samsonite l35 notebook case .
fits my macbook with plenty of room .
lots of pokets for my mouse , mouse pad , and accessories .
just the right size for what i wanted .
nice looking , and well built .
the photo online and on the card attached to the case shows foam .
where is it ?
i do n't have any foam included .
there is no way this thin !
thin !
thin !
case would protect a pencil let alone a heavy laptop .
do n't waste your money .
mine goes back tomorrow !
i use this case on a daily basis and have used it for about five months and by then both strap attachments and the handle broke and i am already having to look for a new case .
if you are going to use this daily buy something that is of better quality .
it looks nice and is not very bulky but will brake due to poor quality .
i really liked this bag .
it has room for power cables and a few other small things .
i had it for over a year but only used it occasionally .
unfortunately over the holidays the hand strap broke .
great buy , just be careful with the straps .
i bought this case at the recomendation of a friend .
the size of the case is great , it even fits under te seat on smaller airplanes .
i do not need a lot of space for extras , so this is the perfect size .
the padding is good and it is quite stylish .
there is just enough size for a mouse , power cord , a fre cd 's and a cell phone .
i love the styling and details , it is well thought out .
there is although one drawback .
my machine is just shy of the maximum size allowed by th specs .
there is a pouch inside for the computer , and it is a tight fit to put it in .
this is a definite drawback , but given the opportunity i would buy the same one again .
i love this bag and i am so glad that i ordered it .
i shopped around for a few weeks and nothing is as good as this .
the quality of the bag is outstanding .
the design is perfect to fit the laptop , batteries , pens , paperwork , etc.. the padding inside really keeps the laptop secure .
other laptop bags that i saw were either bulky or super expensive .
the price on amazon is great however i would have definately paid more given what is out there currently .
if you are considering this product look no further because this is what you have been looking for !

quality: not very good quality materials , they are n't durable . the handles and the zipper breaks too very easily , poor quality bag .
the accessories are not of good quality , they can break . some rivets get out of place and cause a troublesome break .
it is nice looking quality but with too much use the handle and the zipper breaks so it 's better to be careful in managing the case .
looks: this is a nice looking case . it is n't fancy or fashionable but it is ok. a well built case that does the job .
the bag looks quite good , it is very elegant . the size is limited but functional . it is nice and well built although with little shine .
it 's an ok looking case , not very stylish or fancy but it does the job . it is well built .
fit: this bag is great for 14 inches devices . it 's compact and comfortable , but for a bigger device there 's not much space left for other stuff .
in some cases the bag could be small , but it is useful because it fits perfectly under the seat on airplanes .
it 's a good size bag , it has room for plenty of stuffs asuming the laptop is n't more than 14 inches .
general: the quality of the bag is outstanding . the design is perfect to fit the laptop , batteries , pens , paperwork , etc.. the padding inside really keeps the laptop secure . nice looking , and well built . there is no way this thin ! thin ! thin ! case would protect a pencil let alone a heavy laptop . but will brake due to poor quality .

it has room for power cables and a few other small things . the padding is good i love the styling and details , and it is a tight fit and keeps the computer really protected , the quality of the bag is outstanding . the price on amazon is great just the right size nice looking , and well built . i do n't have any foam included . and received no communication in return ! but will brake due to poor quality . it was way too small . it can only fit a 14 `` screen . but it 's too thin . does n't look shiny and fancy , though ,

and is not very bulky the padding inside really keeps the laptop secure . the price on amazon is great lots of pokets for my mouse , mouse pad , and accessories . nice looking , and well built . but will brake due to poor quality . it was way too small . but it 's too thin .

sentences: i purchased this rolling bag about six months ago .
i travel frequently for work and depend on this bag to get me through airports and into and out of schools .
the telescoping handle stopped retracting about a month ago and an airline agent showed me how to push the little button in the rear compartment to free the mechanism .

picture lots of people waiting as i unzipped the bag to fool with the handle on shuttle buses , in airline aisles , etc.. then last week the black plastic handle that is supposed to cradle inside the other handle snapped off the bag as a bus driver lifted it .
i am going to contact kensington about a refund because the bag is still under warrantee .
i do not want a replacement unless the bag has been redesigned .
i really liked that vertical design of this bag because it could be pulled down aisles in planes .
i 've used this once and it really did n't meet my expectations .
i 've been looking for a carry on bag that works for me and this is n't it .
besides that , it 's already starting to fall apart .
there were several things i liked about this bag .
shoe storage on each side of the handle is a smart use of space .
the pockets made sense as well .
so nice organization in this bag i returned it because i just did n't like the look and needed more room for clothing and less for files .
this bag might be better suited to men then women .
just personal preference .

i needed a laptop bag with wheels since i was tired of carrying around my heavy bookbag at the airport ... this one is great , so many compartments , the wide-set wheels help prevent it from tipping over , and the handle is comfortable .
my only complaint is the finishing strip on the back side at the base came off very quickly , but i did n't really care that much .
i 've been looking for a carry-on bag that would accommodate my laptop , some clothing and personnel items .
this is a well made bag and is a dream to roll thru the airport .
it has many little compartments to pack almost anything .
a separate center compartment unzips to pull out the laptop for security at the airport .
i had been using a laptop backpack to carry my computer and peripherals which got extremely heavy after long periods of hauling around .
the price is great compared to other bags with these same features .
from the picture on amazon this product appeared to be of good quality .
four ( 4 ) weeks after we purchased the item some of the stripping at the bottom of the bag peeled off .
i was unable to return the item because i had it just over the four weeks .
i decided to keep the product and about 3 weeks from that date , one ( 1 ) of the handles broke on the item and left me with just the one handle to lift the item with .
five ( 5 ) months later the last handle finally broke off the product .
i used this bag solely for the purpose of carrying my laptop and supplies .
i am very disappointed in the quality of item given the amount of money requested .
both handles on this case have broken .
the plastic handles can not stand up to normal wear and tear .
the case was not too bad , but now it is useless .
i will be returning it to kensington .
the basic concept and design would rate five stars if execution were not flawed .
the zipper pulls sacrifice function and durability for style .
in the course of just one trip to asia , have already had one pull come off .
the bag could also use a shoulder strap for those inevitable situations ( climbing stairs and negotiating narrow aisles ) when you ca n't roll the thing .
the kensington laptop case has good protection for a laptop .
there is sufficient space to carry laptop accessories and a daytimer , folders , a jacket or raincoat , noise reduction earphones and munchies for the road .
i 'm pleased with it and recommend it for road warriors who travel frequently , as i do .
the only drawback is having to leave it plane-side for small planes .
this bag is incredible if you have a 17 inch laptop .
it 's so hard to find a good bag that 'll fit my enormous laptop , and this one more than fits the bill .
it has a really comfortable handle if you need to carry it , and has so many hidden pockets and places to put things .
i love it , and ca n't say enough about it .
the quality is also excellent .
i highly recommend getting one .
it 's worth the price .

quality: from the pictures , it looks like this product is very well made but with a few times of use it rips , the handles break and the zipper too , so this product is n't made from the best materials .
in the pictures the case looks like it is made from good quality materials but it is not . the zipper and the strap breaks and can not stand normal use . not a good quality case .
it looks like a well made case but the straps break very easily just weeks after the first use and the zipper too , so the materials are n't from great quality .
looks: this item looks ok , there 's not much to say about it . the manufacturer sacrifices the zipper quality for style .
the looks of this case is n't spectacular . it 's an ok looking bag , not the most fashionable bag . the manufacter sacrifice the durability for a little bit of style .
it is a case with an ok style . it sacrifices the utility and durability for the look but there is n't much to say .
fit: this bag is perfect for big sized devices like a 17 inches laptop , and also besides that it has great extra space to put small items .
it has a great vertical design that fits a large device perfectly , it also has extra space to put extra items .
it 's a great case for big sized devices . it has plenty of space . it is perfect for 17 inch laptops .
general: i really liked that vertical design of this bag the kensington laptop case has good protection for a laptop . the quality is also excellent . it has many little compartments to pack almost anything . the price is great i am very disappointed in the quality of item the zipper pulls sacrifice function and durability for style . the only drawback is having to leave it plane-side for small planes .

shoe storage on each side of the handle is a smart use of space . the kensington laptop case has good protection for a laptop . so many compartments , and the handle is comfortable . the quality is also excellent . it 's worth the price . this is a well made bag i am very disappointed in the quality of item both handles on this case have broken . the zipper pulls sacrifice function and durability for style . because i just did n't like the look the only drawback is having to leave it plane-side for small planes .

the kensington laptop case has good protection for a laptop . it has a really comfortable handle the quality is also excellent . it has many little compartments to pack almost anything . i am very disappointed in the quality of item the plastic handles can not stand up to normal wear the zipper pulls sacrifice function and durability for style .

sentences: first time i have been dissappointed with a product from amazon .
appearantly others are having the same problem with a 17 `` laptop not fitting in the compartment .
my laptop is a standard size in the market .
the bag may look good but that does n't help if laptop does n't fit .
totally dissappointed with swissgear and amazon .
like a dummy i ordered it after reading that it does n't fit some of the 17 `` models .
i have an hp and it doesnt fit .
on the plus side it does have a lot of nooks and crannies to put stuff in .
just disappointed to find out my laptop does n't fit .
need to leave it unzipped .
just build it a tad bit bigger and send my one for my idea .
you 'll have the best on the market !
nice try ` eh
i was really excited to get this backpack because i had been carefully searching for a backpack that had to fit my 17 inch laptop .
i received my swissgear backpack and really loved all of the pockets , padded straps , all the compartments it had and the durability of the fabric and the price was right .
in the stores , this backpack would have been at least double the price .
but , when i tried to fit my laptop in the compartment it was supposed to go in , it did n't fit .
i was really disappointed because everything else about this backpack was really nice .
i was able to fit it in another compartment which fits snug , but it does n't have the padding or strap that is supposed to hold it in place .
i did decide to just keep the backpack because of all of it 's other features and other uses i have for it and it 's ability to hold my laptop in another compartment .
my 15 .
6 `` hp pavilion dv6-1360us ( 14 .
15 `` x1.33 `` ) barely fit inside the protective slot for laptop in this bag !
when i put my laptop in the protective slot , the laptop get very close to the zipper , and the laptop pushes against the top of the bag ( i can see laptop corners through the bag ) .
i have to be very careful to zip it to make sure that the zipper does not scratch my laptop .
i am a little worried about carrying weight in the bag because it will press against the laptop .
the bag does have a bigger space by the protective slot .
it is big enough for my laptop , but does not have any cushion on the sides ( there is a little cushion at the bottom ) .
i may put my laptop here by adding some cushion if i feel too uncomfortable about putting my laptop in the protective slot .
other than this , the bag appears to be rugged and well made .
we initially had trouble unzipping the bag because some zipper teeth were not aligned .
but after we pushed them in , it works fine .
as other reviewers noticed , the mp3 slot is inside the bag .
do n't know how useful that it .
this is a well constructed product made of quality materials .
the color is a true red as i thought it would be and not a hot pink as it appears in the ad .
i have read a lot of different opinions about what size laptop fits in it .
i have a sony vaio that measures 15 ?
1/8 inches long and it fits nicely .
i 'm not sure that it would fit if it were much longer .
it has many pockets for just about anything you might want to carry while traveling .
not sure why i had to pay more for it than the blue or black ?
i was very disappointed with this backpack .
it says it fits a 17inch notebook , however it did not .
it is always a hassle to return christmas gifts - not that it was difficult through amazon ( very easy and hassle free ) - just the hassle of packing up and going to the post office .
we bought this as a good price .
that is all i can say .
the laptop we have does n't fit in it .
and after using the pack for less than a month , it is ripping out already .
definatly would not purchase again and would not recomend .
this is a very well made bag , nice construction , lots of pockets .

the pocket for the media player is on the inside of the bag and there 's a connector there as well with the wire running down through the bag strap to a connector outside of the bag for you to use with your headphones with .
the bad thing about this bag is that it barely fits my xps m1710 and my hp pavilion dv7-3080us cant fit at all , which is a big disappointment .
i love this backpack .
the quality is excellent and i love all the pockets and compartments .
i have a 15 .
4 `` widescreen laptop and it fits great .
however , because my laptop is 6 .
4lbs and the backpack is 6lbs , the weight can add up fast .
i have a lot of textbooks for school and the weight of everything usually averages 40lbs .
granted , the bag holds it all very well with room to spare and it is very durable .
i bought the bag a couple years ago and it still looks brand new .
i 've also used the bag for weekend camping ( minus the laptop ) and can fit all my clothes and whatnot in it -- i love how much stuff it can hold .
also , once i have the bag on my back , the straps are very comfortable .
it 's just not the lightest backpack to swing on your shoulder and run out the door .
i purchased this bag for my husband .
he is a supervisor and carries his laptop everywhere .
he loves this bag and ca n't beleive the price we were able to get it for on amazon.com .
we have seen this same bag out in the stores for close to $ 100 .
it is very well made and protects everything inside .
if you are even thinking about buying this bag - get it !

quality: from the pictures , it looks like this product is very well made . but with a few times of use it rips , the handles break and the zipper too , so this product is n't made from the best materials .
this is a greaat backpack , very well made product with good materials . very good quality and durable for the price .
this is a very well made bag with quality materials . very well constructed and very durable for the price . it 's excellent .
looks: the look of this item is ok. there 's not much to say about it . the manufacturer sacrifices the zipper quality for style .
the looks of this backpack is good . the color is n't like the picture but is ok. it is a nice durable backpack .
it is a great looking bag . the colors are n't like the ad but it 's ok because they are durable across the time .
fit: this bags does n't fit some of the 17 inches models . the device is really tight inside of the backpack and it gets very close to the zipper where it can get scratched .
this back does n't fit a 17 inch device , and if it fits it is too small inside . it barely closes and the corners of the laptop are visible from the outside .
althougth the title says it fits a 17 inch laptop it does n't quite . maybe it can fit one but it is very tight . a smaller laptop fits perfectly .
general: this is a very well made bag , nice construction , lots of pockets . the quality is excellent and it is very durable . the straps are very comfortable . and protects everything inside . the color is a true red and it fits nicely . it is ripping out already . and it doesnt fit . it 's just not the lightest backpack because some zipper teeth were not aligned .

this is a very well made bag , nice construction , lots of pockets . the straps are very comfortable . and protects everything inside . it says it fits a 17inch notebook , however it did not . after using the pack for less than a month , it is ripping out already .

the quality is excellent and i love all the pockets and compartments . and it is very durable . and ca n't beleive the price and protects everything inside . the laptop does n't fit in it . it is ripping out already . it 's just not the lightest backpack

sentences: crap .
the `` leather `` is already peeling , and the straps are small.. i can barely sling it over my shoulder .
it will fit a lap top.. and that is about it .
head to tj maxx/ross and find something better
this is a nice big bag , and super cheap , but i wanted something that was n't so obviously plastic .
i also did n't like the stitching .
just looked cheap .
sent it back .
decently sized bag , a bit taller than i had anticipated .
serves its purpose just fine and i 'm content with the look of it .
the biggest problem is the straps .
they 're made from some sort of really stiff material .
you can easily scrape/burn yourself if you 're not careful , or it 'll hurt if it digs into your shoulder the wrong way .
like others have mentioned , it does smell .
protip : do not leave a ziploc of crackers in there for more than a day or two .
it will acquire the smelly essence of this bag when you later retrieve it .
you will taste it , and you will not like it .
it looks exactly like the picture and works great .
has a couple pockets inside that are convenient and is definitely large enough to hold such a large laptop .
definitely a great value !
this bag is great because it works for a larger laptop .
also , it has a zipper , so you do n't have to worry about things falling out of the bag .
i use this daily at work because i often have to change meeting rooms/work areas .
this bag comfortably fits a laptop , notebooks , pens , etc.. it also has little metal `` feet `` so that the bag will sit upright when you put it on the floor .
the outside pocket is handy , but it also has pockets inside for 3 pens , and then 2 larger pockets , which i use for my iphone and smaller items .
there 's a zippered pocket inside as well .
i have a 17 `` monitor and looked everywhere for a case that would work .
this one works great and looks cute .
it looks good , but the smell is really bad .
after i read the tag saying : this item uses the chemical that may cause cancer , birth defect , and reproductive harm !
i shoveled it into the box and return it immediately !
this bag is very padded , has lots of compartments and space , but , it 's too heavy .
also the straps on this bag are so firm that they do n't bend easily .
this causes my shoulders to hurt after only a few minutes .
i stopped using it .
will have to search for something better .
i bought this bag for my 17 inch laptop.. fits perfectly !
i have an extended battery on my laptop and this bag can fit my laptop , the charger , a few notebooks , pencils , pens , and few other small items .
it definetly does its job well .

it is a nice bag my only thing is that on the edges it starting to peel a bit.. perhaps its from rubbing on my jeans or just getting thrown around a bit.. i take good care of my stuff.. its better than nothing .
for the price its good.. it doesnt compare to a nice leather bag.. the price also doesnt compare to that of a leather bag.. overall , its a great bag .
does what its supposed to do .
sender sent quickly.. : )
bought this as my back up bag b/c i am tough on my bags .
i bought to use for my court briefcase to bring legal sized files in .
seems very durable and a good size .
have n't used it much yet though but i am happy with it so far !

i am very picky about bags , purses , etc.. and a bag for carrying my macbook pro in is not something to be taken lightly : ) after reading very helpful reviews on this i decided to give it a try and so glad i did .
i love the material on the outside and it 's very spacious for my 15 `` laptop and other books , folders for school .
the only complaint is that i wish it had small pockets on the outside for my phone , wallet , keys instead of one huge pocket where i find myself digging for those things .
but that is just me complaining , because this is a really great buy .

quality: it is made from a hard material and it peels very easily . it also has a strong chemical smell .
it 's made from nice materials but not very durable . the outside peels very easily but it is ok despite the chemical smell .
the material is n't the best . it looks like leather but it is n't and it peels a bit with use . it also has a funny smell like chemicals .
looks: it has a good look just like the picture . it 's pretty .
it has a cute look very fashionable and with good design just like the picture , but nothing extraordinary . it is just a bag .
there 's not much to say . it looks just like the pictures . it 's really pretty and fashionable but it 's not an outstanding bag .
fit: it is great , very spacious . it fits a large laptop very well and extra stuff like the charger and mouse .
this bag has a great size . it fits my device perfectly and also has extra space for other extra items like pencils , books and the charger . it works great for a large laptop .
this is a large bag that fits perfectly a 15 inch device and it has extra space to put extra items such as pencils , books and also the charger .
general: it looks good , this bag is very padded , this is a nice big bag , and super cheap , seems very durable and a good size . has a couple pockets inside that are convenient the `` leather `` is already peeling , and the straps are small.. it 's too heavy . i also did n't like the stitching . the biggest problem is the straps .

it looks good , this bag is very padded , has lots of compartments and space , but , fits perfectly ! seems very durable and a good size . it looks exactly like the picture definitely a great value ! ! ! i love the material on the outside because it works for a larger laptop . that the bag will sit upright the outside pocket is handy , but the smell is really bad . the `` leather `` is already peeling , and the straps are small.. it will fit a lap top.. and that is about it . it 's too heavy . just looked cheap .

this bag is very padded , and this bag can fit my laptop , the charger , a few notebooks , pencils , pens , and few other small items . for the price its good.. seems very durable and a good size . but the smell is really bad . the `` leather `` is already peeling , the biggest problem is the straps .

sentences: i want to be clear , the vendor that i purchased this hunk of junk from stood up for it and supplied a perfect replacement at no extra charge .
as far as the case logic bag though i was severely disappointed .
i researched for a long time to find what i thougt would be a good bag for my needs .
this bag was it until i received it .
it came in with a defective zipper and i tried twice to contact the manufacturer case logic , and they never even responded .
this from a consumer standpoint really turned me off from even considering a case logic in the future .
i will also never recommend their product to anyone .
i will however say the samsonite replacement that the vendor sent me was great and it worked really well on my trip .
quality was the factor and the zippers on the case logic were substandard , so be careful when considering their product .
i was happy with this bag early on.. seemingly well padded , lots of space and pockets , and an attractive design for a reasonable price .
however , after less than 2 weeks of use , the strap detached from one side as i was walking down the sidewalk .
the bag swung down and hit the pavement on one corner , denting in the corner of my laptop .
now , i did have a laptop , battery , and a few notebooks/books in the bag , but i did n't feel that it was significantly overloaded or heavy .
upon closer examination , it appeared that the sewing/seam attaching the strap to the bag is minimal , and probably not very durable ( the strap on the other side was also halfway torn out ) .
i was also disappointed the padding underneath was not very effective in protecting my laptop .
overall , its a pretty nice-looking bag , but the seams where the strap attaches to the bag are one pretty significant flaw ... just not a durable design .
if you do decide to purchase this bag , be sure to keep it loaded very lightly .
i just bought an acer aspire timelinex 13 `` , and the laptop fits perfect there .
the case design is the most comfortable that i 've had .
it 's compact , padded everywhere and with a lot of compartments .
the mesh pocket is very useful for the laptop 's large power brick .
the only downside is that before 2 weeks of very mild use ( and only used it to transport the laptop one time from ny to boston and back ) and one of the corners already got ripped .
looks like they 're not very durable .
i 'm including a pic .
this laptop case from case logic is nice for a non-fancy leathery kind .
it is a 13-14 inch case , sadly a little too small for my toshiba .
my dell would be fine in it , though .
it has sufficient pockets and nice padding for the laptop compartment .
it is black and gray with lime green .
the handle is adjustable and i think it would do well in the rain , as it seems the rain would roll right off of it .
overall , a nice well-made product for its level .
the messenger bag has a place for every thing and for the price it is a great value .
i hope the handles wear well but i would feel this about any product made of the same material .
the bag closes up very nice and is not baggie or sloppy looking , it has good form , that 's important to me .
the function of the bag and its clean lines are well thought out .
over all a really good purchases .
i started using this bag in july to carry my laptop to and from work .
three months later and the strap ripped .
i only carry the laptop and a few papers , i ca n't understand how a laptop bag could be so cheaply made .
it 's a good thing that it has good padding , otherwise , it would 've damaged the computer .
very dissappointed .
i 've contacted case logic , we 'll see what happens .
the case looks lovely , and has lots of nice pockets .
but , the first case that i rec 'd had a defective zipper .
no problem getting it returned and replaced .
the replacement case appeared fine - until i used it for travel the first time .
the pad that slips over the straps to provide comfort when carrying the case started coming apart , and when the fraying stops , the pad will fall off .

an additional note on the padded shoulder strap : the buckle on the ` adjustable shoulder strap ' does not actually fit through that shoulder pad , so the strap can never be adjusted to anything other than short or shorter length if you want to use that padding .

if you actually want it to go over-the-shoulder and across your body like a true messenger , you ca n't adjust the strap to be long enough ( unless you do n't want that pad to be on your shoulder - ouch ) .
this was true of both cases , so it is simply bad design .
the bag is nice and seems well made .
my only complaint is that the shoulder strap is not on a metal swivel .
sooner or later the plastic connector or the strap is going to break from wear .
i 'm pretty pleased with this messenger bag .
it has loads of space since i only own a 10 `` netbook .
i 'm not sure how well this would accommodate a larger laptop , but for my purposes , i 've got lots of room to spare for other goodies and that 's the biggest reason i like it .
as far as internal padding , it 's a bit weak for my taste .
i place my netbook inside a padded sleeve before placing it into this bag .
i like a little more protection for my computer than what is in this bag .
if i did n't already have a padded sleeve , i 'd probably be disappointed with this bag .
i 'm also not sure how durable this material is .

i 've been using this bag daily for well over a month now and thus far , it has held up quite well , but something tells me this is a 1-3 year use bag and not a 5-10 year bag , but then again , it all depends on your usage of it and whether or not you 're very hard on it .
for my purposes and use of the bag , i am pleased .
i 'm using it every day .
this is really nice case .
you can access the laptop without needing to open the flap and the laptop comes out easily .
i 've had this for about 6 months it has no signs of wear .
it is very durable .
it also has a large amount of padding , probably about 1/2 `` .
the flap has three pockets ; one on the outside and two on the inside .
i have no problems fitting a mouse , mouse pad , charger , and headset inside it .
however , it is too small to fit a keyboard .
one review complains about the flap being held in place with magnets .

mine is attached with velcro .
